title: Electric Utility Worker Shortage Spurs Silicon Valley Power to Offer Local Scholarships (City of Santa ...
text: ( Source : City of Santa Clara, CA ) Scholarships and tuition grants are available to college and technical school students who live in the City of Santa Clara and are pursuing careers related to the electric utility industry. Career
